attributes.action: pay for the damage to his chauffer driven car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Several press reports have cited the damage caused by an irate PM stabbing the back of the front seat with his black pen. 

We as tax payers will have to foot the bill for this. Given this PM has destroyed the national finances with his WAG like spending habits, picking up the tab for this criminal damage is the least he can do

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
